divs: sighting detailshad heard of unexplained lights near murrysville pa so i decided to drive to the us. the first set of lights appeared like a low flying plane with 3 orange\yellow lights and one blinking light. it came from the right hand side (north) and flew towards the left (south bound). the lights changed in their configuration and after approxiamately 8 seconds it disappeared completely. the second light was brighter and was in a wooded area near a place called duff park, off hwy 22. after sevral minutes it diappeared, there were no houses near by. both lights were seen with 10x50 binoculars.
